sent.orig: Two senior Areva officials were ejected from the country in spite of French denials.
sent.trans: 尽管法国方面对上述指控予以否认，尼日尔还是将阿海珐公司两名资深高管驱逐出境。

sent.orig: In spite of the fall from his horse, his leg was surprisingly uninjured.
sent.trans: 尽管从马上摔了下来，他的腿却出人意外地未受伤害。

sent.orig: In spite of our differences Jim and I are close friends as well as brothers.
sent.trans: 尽管吉姆和我有诸多不同，但仍是手足兄弟，亲密朋友。

sent.orig: Linda is respective in spite of her age.
sent.trans: 不管她的年龄，琳达是应受尊敬的。

sent.orig: In spite of the rising production cost, our price have remain stable.
sent.trans: 尽管生产成本一直在上升，可我们的价格却始终保持稳定。
